name: Buttermilk Blue Cheese Dressing
description: The buttermilk in this blue cheese dressing may seem superfluous, but it absolutely makes it, both for the great lactic flavor it adds and also because it thins the dressing just enough so it flows freely.

recipeInstructions.text: In a medium bowl, mash blue cheese with a whisk. Whisk in mayonnaise, sour cream, buttermilk, and lemon juice until a smooth, slightly lumpy dressing forms. Season with pepper. (The blue cheese will likely make the dressing salty enough, but taste and add salt if necessary.) Serve.
